serviceDescription: Integrate with Notion to manage databases, pages, and content in your Notion workspace.

getDatabaseItems.description: Retrieves items from a specified Notion database

parameters.databaseId: The ID of the Notion database
parameters.filter: Optional filter to apply to the database query
parameters.sorts: Optional sort configurations for the database query

createNotionPage.description: Creates a new page in Notion, either in a database or as a child of another page

parameters.parentId: The ID of the parent (database or page)
parameters.parentType: The type of parent (database_id or page_id)
parameters.properties: The properties of the page to create
parameters.children: Optional content blocks for the page

updateNotionPage.description: Updates an existing page in Notion

parameters.pageId: The ID of the page to update
parameters.properties: The properties to update on the page

searchNotion.description: Searches for content across the Notion workspace
